page.title: 18Moving House into Cottesmore
page.content: In March 1985 my Dad came home one night from work,and said that we were moving to R.A.F Cottesmore.My Mum said "Oh No!"because she was pregnant at the time.On 10th April 1985 My Mum went into Hospital to have my bother called Stuart Brian Ward.He was born at 6:00pm.On the 12th April 1985.My brother Leon, my Nana and I went to see my Mum. On the 29th of June I was very sad because it was my last day at school and the last time I would see my friends.When we got to our new home at Cottesmore I went out and had a look round.I found two parks and two new roads:Bedale Street and Burley Circle. July 1st was my first day at school,it was also Sports Day.I came first in the obstacle race.I'm getting to like it at Cottesmore.My friend is called David.
